column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////They do serve other foods such tempura
column3: and takoyaki (nice!) but in the end it's all about their ramen. The interior is also nice and modern but rather small as it's ideal for groups of 2-4 people. Service has been either a hit-or-miss as servers can be inattentive or forgetful but they are generally polite each time I've visited. Overall
column4: I would definitely recommend this place to people who are looking for good
column5: tasty ramen or looking for new place to try out.
